# saveToPreferences()

**Instance Method**

Saves the HotspotManager configuration in the Network Extension preferences.

## Declaration

```swift
final func saveToPreferences() async throws
```

## Discussion

Only call this method after previously calling [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotManager/loadFromPreferences()] to load the configuration.

This method throws [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotManager/Error] value asynchronously on failure.

## Managing the saved configuration

- **loadFromPreferences()**: Loads the hotspot manager configuration from the Network Extension preferences.
- **removeFromPreferences()**: Removes the hotspot manager configuration from the Network Extension preferences.
